title: [K-12] Case-Based E-Learning Course on Renal Reflexology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and basic knowledge of human physiology
context.additional_context: Cultivating clinical symptom assessment capabilities in reflexology through electronic learning under face-to-face education restrictions

learning_goals: Learners can explain the physiological/pathological mechanisms of kidney-related clinical symptoms (edema, hypertension, etc.) through e-learning modules
Learners can perform patient symptom evaluation and clinical reasoning processes with 80%+ accuracy through provided nephrotic syndrome case analyses
Learners can write PBL reports incorporating peer feedback and propose kidney disease diagnostic protocols in three or more stages

resources: Nephrotic Syndrome Virtual Patient Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
